headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid DHR and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Danaher’s shares (currently trading at $193.08) have posted a disappointing 15.3% loss while the S&P 500 was down 1.8%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
